HTMLMediaElementPlayed.summary: The played read-only property of the interface indicates the time ranges the resource, an {{htmlelement("audio")}} or {{htmlelement("video")}} media file, has played. It returns a new object that contains the ranges of the media source that the browser has played, if any, at the time the attribute is evaluated.
HTMLMediaElementPlayed.value: A object; representing the time ranges that have been played.
